body: If it's not her husband then I'll root for ichinose..god damn their sex scenes panels were superior
@Hidari I doubt it if anything the husband might become a cuck rather than ichinose gets her to himself with his mommy issues ass he doesn't genuinely love her

*SCREAMS* YES YES YES IT FINALLY UPDATED!!! I HAVE BEEN WAITING TEN THOUSAND LONG YEARS...!!!! Ichinose is my favorite and I was genuinely worried that Katsura Airi dropped this. Holy fuck I cannot wait for the translation! 1) The sex scenes with jealous junior were actually really hot. 2) I'm relieved that the new skeevy stubble man has not yet been featured naked. Fingers crossed it stays that way. 3) That cliffhanger scene restores my faith that Ichinose is in control and playing the long game. I assume that since he knows he can't win her heart and she'll never leave her husband of her own accord, he's trying to wreck her marriage with an infidelity scandal while keeping his own reputation pristine. Then theoretically, she'll emotionally break and accept Ichinose. This makes me feel better about the hotwifing thing, if this was his machination. The real question is if Ichinose holds genuine affection for her, or if he'll depart from the wreckage of his conquest...
I have a NTR story that happened in my city to sum up the cheater and her partner get burned up in the a car they caught theme in
Lmao this idiot is the fall guy. That's just halarious
